title: The 11 Best Forehead Wrinkle Patches to Make Fine Lines Disappear
description: Now you see them, now you don't.
excerpt: Skin experts share the 11 best forehead wrinkle patches to smooth fine lines and wrinkles.
text: 1Best for Overnight UseFrownies Forehead & Between Eyes Wrinkle PatchesConsCan be uncomfortable to sleep inCreated in 1889, these adhesive patches have become a viral sensation as an alternative to Botox treatments. Unlike many wrinkle patches, Frownies are designed to smooth wrinkles and fine lines by acting as a cast, relaxing the muscles and preventing expressions that cause wrinkling as you sleep. Before applying, spray the patches with water to activate the adhesive. Then, once the patches are tacky, place them along your forehead to create the cast. In the morning, you'll wake up with smooth, soft skin.Frownies rating: 4/5 starsA Frownies reviewer says: “I’ll admit I was skeptical- as I have used Botox for some time and was looking for an alternative. The forehead patches have really helped reduce the tension and lines in my forehead that were coming back between Botox treatments. So much so, that I’m considering not using Botox anymore!”Includes: One long perforated strip that can be torn into 144 patchesSkin type: Normal, dry, combination, and oily2Best ValueWrinkle Schminkles Forehead Wrinkle PatchesMade with 100 percent medical-grade silicone, these reusable patches are soft and comfortable on the skin, making them the perfect overnight treatment to smooth fine lines. Unlike single-use patches, the silicone adhesive creases an occlusive layer over the skin that firms the skin and prevents it from creasing. This also helps to increase blood flow and promote collagen production to soften lines over time.Wrinkle Schminkles rating: 4.4/5 starsA Wrinkle Schminkles reviewer says: “I've been using these every other night or so for about a week. There's a very noticeable difference first thing in the morning Throughout the day my lines gradually come back, but I think at the end of the day they are still softer than before I started using these patches.”Includes: Two reusable silicon patchSkin type: Normal, dry, combination, and oilyAdvertisement - Continue Reading Below3Best for a Targeted Treatmentinnisfree Retinol Cica Microneedle Focusing Patch ProsSmall patches for smaller areasTechnically designed for pimples, the bite-sized patches are perfect for covering smaller, premature forehead lines that require precise targeting. The formula contains fine line-busting retinol, plumping hyaluronic acid, and soothing cica to improve the overall appearance of wherever these patches land. Sephora rating: 3.9/5 stars A Sephora reviewer says: “These work great for me. I have found that they get rid of whatever I put them over. I think the retinol really helps. Will for sure be buying again.”Includes: 2 sheets of 18 patchesSkin type: Normal, dry, combination, oily4Best Luxury Option111SKIN Wrinkle Erasing Retinol PatchesWhile some patches may feel like they're simply sitting on your skin, these patches are designed with microcone technology that deeply absorbs active ingredients into the skin to smooth wrinkles. As you apply each patch, the tiny needle-like structures dissolve, infusing your skin with ingredients like retinol and vitamin C to reduce the appearance of fine lines and brighten the skin.111SKIN rating: 4.8/5 starsA 111SKIN reviewer says: “These are like magic! I apply them overnight before anything important just to "iron out" any lines that are noticeable and they are gone by morning.”Includes: Three treatment sets; each set contains 2 x semi-circle patches, 2 x strips for targeting forehead expression lines, 1 x patch for targeting frown linesSkin type: All Skin TypesAdvertisement - Continue Reading Below5Best for HydrationInsutam Forehead Wrinkle Patches for Anti-wrinklesConsTakes a while to see resultsA lesser-known fact about wrinkles and fine lines is that they are not exclusively signs of aging but can also be signs of skin dehydration. These patches are made with a blend of ultra-hydrating ingredients like aloe, hyaluronic acid, and glycerin to deeply moisturize and nourish the skin.Amazon rating: 4.4/5 starsAmazon reviewer says:"I’ve been using this product everyday for a month and I have noticed a HUGE difference in my skin. It moisturizes, lightens the appearance of wrinkles, and leaves my skin so soft and smooth! I highly recommend!!”Includes: 12 single use patchesSkin type: All skin types6Best Silicone OptionDermaclara Forehead Wrinkle PatchProsMany see results quickly ConsGets less sticky after a few usesIf you're looking for an ultra-hydrating wrinkle patch, the Dermclara occlusion patch might be the perfect option. These reusable silicone patches infuse the skin with extra moisture to hydrate every layer, specifically targeting areas prone to wrinkles. Simply cleanse the skin and allow it to dry before applying the patch for up to 30 minutes. After each use, clean and rinse the patch to reactivate the adhesive for up to 30 uses.Dermclara rating: 4.5/5 starsA Dermclara reviewer says: “Great! I use them for 20 minutes before my makeup routine and I can immediately see fine lines smooth out. Then I put on moisturizer and makeup for the day. Great product.”Includes: One reusable silicon patchSkin type: Normal, dry, combination, and oilyAdvertisement - Continue Reading Below7Best for Sensitive SkinSilkdermis Forehead Wrinkle Patches ProsGood for Sensitive Skin ConsNot intense enough for deeper lines and wrinklesFor those with sensitive skin looking for a gentler alternative to the more intense treatment masks, these patches are packed with vitamin E and aloe to help soothe the skin while collagen helps to restore damaged skin.Amazon rating: 4.3/5 starsAn Amazon reviewer says: "These patches actually work to help smooth out wrinkles! I have only used them 3 days in a row and I can already see a difference! They stick on well and stay all night. You can hardly notice they’re there. I have sensitive skin and they don’t irritate it at all! They are easy to remove and also hydrate my forehead that gets super dry in the winter”Includes: 12 single-use patchesSkin type: Normal, dry, combination, and oily; Sensitive skin8Best OverallDr. Dennis Gross Skincare Advanced Retinol + Ferulic Perfectly Dosed Retinol ProsGood for treating uneven skin textureConsMay be too harsh for sensitive skinWhile not exactly patches, these pre-dosed pads are made with pure liquid retinol and ferulic to combat wrinkles and are great for treating and preventing dark spots. Ingredients like bakuchiol and rambutan work together to boost the smoothing benefits of retinol, while hyaluronic acid and squalane draw moisture into the skin.Sephora rating: 4.7/5 starsAn ELLE Editor says: “I used these pads for the first time when they were gifted to me by a friend, and now I like to always keep a few of them stocked. They're so hydrating and leave my skin feeling really soft.” —Tasha Nicole Smith, beauty assistantIncludes: Eight treatment padsSkin type: Normal, dry, combination, and oilyAdvertisement - Continue Reading Below9Best At-Home Microneedling AlternativePeace Out Microneedling Anti-Wrinkle Retinol PatchesConsExpensive for the valueIf you considered getting a microneedling treatment but aren't quite ready for the splurge, these anti-wrinkle packages make it easy to get all of the benefits at a fraction of the price. The 450 microneedles dissolve and saturate the skin with a four-peptide blend to even skin tone and minimize wrinkles and fine lines for visibly smoother skin.Sephora rating: 4/5 starsA Sephora reviewer says: “Been using these for a couple weeks now and wow they really do work! My fine lines and wrinkles are way less prominent and softened. They are not as deep and noticeable. I absolutely love and recommend!”Includes: Six single use patchesSkin type: Normal, dry, combination, and oily10Best Multi-UsePeter Thomas Roth FIRMx Collagen Face & Eye Hydra-Gel PatchesProsProvides a cooling feeling to soothe the skinConsNot great for sensitive skinIf you were looking for a versatile option that allows you to target several areas at once, these patches come in two different sizes to treat forehead and eye wrinkles as well as smile lines. Infused with seven different types of collagen, these patches offer an intense treatment to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. The added ingredients of hyaluronic acid and squalane also help to hydrate the skin and lock in moisture.Sephora Rating: 4.4/5A Sephora Review says: “These are very cooling and refreshing, you just need to find the time to relax with them on. I just stocked up because they really do make a visible difference after you remove them.”Includes: 90 single use patches Skin type: Normal, dry, combination, and oily skinAdvertisement - Continue Reading Below11Best For Deep Wrinkle TreatmentRoC Retinol Correxion Deep Wrinkle Targeted PatchesProsInfused with peptides to stimulate collagenEach patch is made with 80 self-dissolving cones that allow ingredients like retinol and hyaluronic acid to penetrate the skin. Also made with peptides to help improve skin elasticity and promote collagen production, these single-use patches help plump the skin and target deep wrinkles. Wear the patches for up to two hours for quick results, or use them overnight for a more intense treatment.Ulta Rating: 4.5/5 starsAn Ulta Reviewer says: “Awesome awesome and awesome! I couldn't believe the difference the next morning when I removed the patches, I was shocked! The only thing is I wish more came in the package!”Includes: Six single use patchesSkin type: All skin typesAre forehead wrinkle patches actually effective?"The effectiveness of forehead wrinkle patches can vary depending on the individual and the specific product used. Some people may see noticeable results in terms of reduced wrinkle appearance and improved skin texture, while others may not experience significant changes if they are really deep," says Carrillo. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowCould forehead patches be an effective long-term solution to wrinkles with continued use?With any skin care step, consistency is key. "Wrinkle patches can provide temporary results, but they may not offer a long-term solution to wrinkles on their own. Consistent use of wrinkle patches along with a proper skincare regimen that includes facial exercise, moisturizer, sunscreen, and other anti-aging products may help maintain smoother, more youthful-looking skin over time," Carrillo adds. Could forehead patches be used as a preventative measure?There are many different factors that can cause fine lines; dehydration, diet, environmental elements, and even emotional stress can all cause premature aging in the skin in the form of wrinkles. "Patches can be used as a preventative measure to help minimize the formation of wrinkles and fine lines. By keeping the skin hydrated, nourished, and protected from environmental stressors, you can help prevent premature aging and maintain a more youthful appearance," Carrillo explains.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowMeet the ExpertsJoseph Carrillo is a makeup artist and facial sculpting expert based in New York.Why Trust ELLE Beauty?As a leading publisher of fashion, lifestyle, and beauty content, ELLE.com is committed to highlighting the best products in various categories by personally testing the latest and most innovative products, interviewing countless experts, and vetting customer-loved items. For this piece, an ELLE.com writer spoke with skincare experts about the best ways to delay wrinkles. The author personally tested a number of these products and scoured reviews for the top-rated products on the market.
html:
1

Best for Overnight Use

Frownies Forehead & Between Eyes Wrinkle Patches

Cons
  • Can be uncomfortable to sleep in

Created in 1889, these adhesive patches have become a viral sensation as an alternative to Botox treatments. Unlike many wrinkle patches, Frownies are designed to smooth wrinkles and fine lines by acting as a cast, relaxing the muscles and preventing expressions that cause wrinkling as you sleep. Before applying, spray the patches with water to activate the adhesive. Then, once the patches are tacky, place them along your forehead to create the cast. In the morning, you'll wake up with smooth, soft skin.

Frownies rating: 4/5 stars

A Frownies reviewer says: “I’ll admit I was skeptical- as I have used Botox for some time and was looking for an alternative. The forehead patches have really helped reduce the tension and lines in my forehead that were coming back between Botox treatments. So much so, that I’m considering not using Botox anymore!”

Includes: One long perforated strip that can be torn into 144 patches

Skin type: Normal, dry, combination, and oily

2

Best Value

Wrinkle Schminkles Forehead Wrinkle Patches

Made with 100 percent medical-grade silicone, these reusable patches are soft and comfortable on the skin, making them the perfect overnight treatment to smooth fine lines. Unlike single-use patches, the silicone adhesive creases an occlusive layer over the skin that firms the skin and prevents it from creasing. This also helps to increase blood flow and promote collagen production to soften lines over time.

Wrinkle Schminkles rating: 4.4/5 stars

A Wrinkle Schminkles reviewer says: “I've been using these every other night or so for about a week. There's a very noticeable difference first thing in the morning Throughout the day my lines gradually come back, but I think at the end of the day they are still softer than before I started using these patches.”

Includes: Two reusable silicon patch

Skin type: Normal, dry, combination, and oily

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

3

Best for a Targeted Treatment

innisfree Retinol Cica Microneedle Focusing Patch

Pros
  • Small patches for smaller areas

Technically designed for pimples, the bite-sized patches are perfect for covering smaller, premature forehead lines that require precise targeting. The formula contains fine line-busting retinol, plumping hyaluronic acid, and soothing cica to improve the overall appearance of wherever these patches land.

Sephora rating: 3.9/5 stars

A Sephora reviewer says: “These work great for me. I have found that they get rid of whatever I put them over. I think the retinol really helps. Will for sure be buying again.”

Includes: 2 sheets of 18 patches

Skin type: Normal, dry, combination, oily

4

Best Luxury Option

111SKIN Wrinkle Erasing Retinol Patches

While some patches may feel like they're simply sitting on your skin, these patches are designed with microcone technology that deeply absorbs active ingredients into the skin to smooth wrinkles. As you apply each patch, the tiny needle-like structures dissolve, infusing your skin with ingredients like retinol and vitamin C to reduce the appearance of fine lines and brighten the skin.

111SKIN rating: 4.8/5 stars

A 111SKIN reviewer says: “These are like magic! I apply them overnight before anything important just to "iron out" any lines that are noticeable and they are gone by morning.”

Includes: Three treatment sets; each set contains 2 x semi-circle patches, 2 x strips for targeting forehead expression lines, 1 x patch for targeting frown lines

Skin type: All Skin Types

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

5

Best for Hydration

Insutam Forehead Wrinkle Patches for Anti-wrinkles

Cons
  • Takes a while to see results

A lesser-known fact about wrinkles and fine lines is that they are not exclusively signs of aging but can also be signs of skin dehydration. These patches are made with a blend of ultra-hydrating ingredients like aloe, hyaluronic acid, and glycerin to deeply moisturize and nourish the skin.

Amazon rating: 4.4/5 stars

Amazon reviewer says:"I’ve been using this product everyday for a month and I have noticed a HUGE difference in my skin. It moisturizes, lightens the appearance of wrinkles, and leaves my skin so soft and smooth! I highly recommend!!”

Includes: 12 single use patches

Skin type: All skin types

6

Best Silicone Option

Dermaclara Forehead Wrinkle Patch

Pros
  • Many see results quickly
Cons
  • Gets less sticky after a few uses

If you're looking for an ultra-hydrating wrinkle patch, the Dermclara occlusion patch might be the perfect option. These reusable silicone patches infuse the skin with extra moisture to hydrate every layer, specifically targeting areas prone to wrinkles. Simply cleanse the skin and allow it to dry before applying the patch for up to 30 minutes. After each use, clean and rinse the patch to reactivate the adhesive for up to 30 uses.

Dermclara rating: 4.5/5 stars

A Dermclara reviewer says: “Great! I use them for 20 minutes before my makeup routine and I can immediately see fine lines smooth out. Then I put on moisturizer and makeup for the day. Great product.”

Includes: One reusable silicon patch

Skin type: Normal, dry, combination, and oily

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

7

Best for Sensitive Skin

Silkdermis Forehead Wrinkle Patches

Pros
  • Good for Sensitive Skin
Cons
  • Not intense enough for deeper lines and wrinkles

For those with sensitive skin looking for a gentler alternative to the more intense treatment masks, these patches are packed with vitamin E and aloe to help soothe the skin while collagen helps to restore damaged skin.

Amazon rating: 4.3/5 stars

An Amazon reviewer says: "These patches actually work to help smooth out wrinkles! I have only used them 3 days in a row and I can already see a difference! They stick on well and stay all night. You can hardly notice they’re there. I have sensitive skin and they don’t irritate it at all! They are easy to remove and also hydrate my forehead that gets super dry in the winter”

Includes: 12 single-use patches

Skin type: Normal, dry, combination, and oily; Sensitive skin

8

Best Overall

Dr. Dennis Gross Skincare Advanced Retinol + Ferulic Perfectly Dosed Retinol

Pros
  • Good for treating uneven skin texture
Cons
  • May be too harsh for sensitive skin

While not exactly patches, these pre-dosed pads are made with pure liquid retinol and ferulic to combat wrinkles and are great for treating and preventing dark spots. Ingredients like bakuchiol and rambutan work together to boost the smoothing benefits of retinol, while hyaluronic acid and squalane draw moisture into the skin.

Sephora rating: 4.7/5 stars

An ELLE Editor says: “I used these pads for the first time when they were gifted to me by a friend, and now I like to always keep a few of them stocked. They're so hydrating and leave my skin feeling really soft.” —Tasha Nicole Smith, beauty assistant

Includes: Eight treatment pads

Skin type: Normal, dry, combination, and oily

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

9

Best At-Home Microneedling Alternative

Peace Out Microneedling Anti-Wrinkle Retinol Patches

Cons
  • Expensive for the value

If you considered getting a microneedling treatment but aren't quite ready for the splurge, these anti-wrinkle packages make it easy to get all of the benefits at a fraction of the price. The 450 microneedles dissolve and saturate the skin with a four-peptide blend to even skin tone and minimize wrinkles and fine lines for visibly smoother skin.

Sephora rating: 4/5 stars

A Sephora reviewer says: “Been using these for a couple weeks now and wow they really do work! My fine lines and wrinkles are way less prominent and softened. They are not as deep and noticeable. I absolutely love and recommend!”

Includes: Six single use patches

Skin type: Normal, dry, combination, and oily

10

Best Multi-Use

Peter Thomas Roth FIRMx Collagen Face & Eye Hydra-Gel Patches

Pros
  • Provides a cooling feeling to soothe the skin
Cons
  • Not great for sensitive skin

If you were looking for a versatile option that allows you to target several areas at once, these patches come in two different sizes to treat forehead and eye wrinkles as well as smile lines. Infused with seven different types of collagen, these patches offer an intense treatment to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. The added ingredients of hyaluronic acid and squalane also help to hydrate the skin and lock in moisture.

Sephora Rating: 4.4/5

A Sephora Review says: “These are very cooling and refreshing, you just need to find the time to relax with them on. I just stocked up because they really do make a visible difference after you remove them.”

Includes: 90 single use patches

Skin type: Normal, dry, combination, and oily skin

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

11

Best For Deep Wrinkle Treatment

RoC Retinol Correxion Deep Wrinkle Targeted Patches

Pros
  • Infused with peptides to stimulate collagen

Each patch is made with 80 self-dissolving cones that allow ingredients like retinol and hyaluronic acid to penetrate the skin. Also made with peptides to help improve skin elasticity and promote collagen production, these single-use patches help plump the skin and target deep wrinkles. Wear the patches for up to two hours for quick results, or use them overnight for a more intense treatment.

Ulta Rating: 4.5/5 stars

An Ulta Reviewer says: “Awesome awesome and awesome! I couldn't believe the difference the next morning when I removed the patches, I was shocked! The only thing is I wish more came in the package!”

Includes: Six single use patches

Skin type: All skin types

Are forehead wrinkle patches actually effective?

"The effectiveness of forehead wrinkle patches can vary depending on the individual and the specific product used. Some people may see noticeable results in terms of reduced wrinkle appearance and improved skin texture, while others may not experience significant changes if they are really deep," says Carrillo.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Could forehead patches be an effective long-term solution to wrinkles with continued use?

With any skin care step, consistency is key. "Wrinkle patches can provide temporary results, but they may not offer a long-term solution to wrinkles on their own. Consistent use of wrinkle patches along with a proper skincare regimen that includes facial exercise, moisturizer, sunscreen, and other anti-aging products may help maintain smoother, more youthful-looking skin over time," Carrillo adds.

Could forehead patches be used as a preventative measure?

There are many different factors that can cause fine lines; dehydration, diet, environmental elements, and even emotional stress can all cause premature aging in the skin in the form of wrinkles. "Patches can be used as a preventative measure to help minimize the formation of wrinkles and fine lines. By keeping the skin hydrated, nourished, and protected from environmental stressors, you can help prevent premature aging and maintain a more youthful appearance," Carrillo explains.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Meet the Experts

Joseph Carrillo is a makeup artist and facial sculpting expert based in New York.

Why Trust ELLE Beauty?

As a leading publisher of fashion, lifestyle, and beauty content, ELLE.com is committed to highlighting the best products in various categories by personally testing the latest and most innovative products, interviewing countless experts, and vetting customer-loved items. For this piece, an ELLE.com writer spoke with skincare experts about the best ways to delay wrinkles. The author personally tested a number of these products and scoured reviews for the top-rated products on the market.
